title: Starting node with Lodestar sometimes is postponed by few minutes.
body:
**Describe the bug**
While running our smoke tests I've noticed multiple times, that nodes which are using Lodestar are connecting way much longer than others. Noticed a log `No incoming messages from Consensus Client. Please make sure that it's working properly` and after few minutes (this one appears after 5 minutes) it connecting finally.
When I'll notice it again, then will try to fetch also CL logs, as for now I have only Seq links to old runs:
[https://seq.nethermind.io/#/events?filter=Contains(NodeName,%20'Smoke-Tests-MasterChec[…]2&from=2022-10-12T14:30:00.000Z&to=2022-10-12T14:40:00.000Z](https://seq.nethermind.io/#/events?filter=Contains(NodeName,%20'Smoke-Tests-MasterCheck')%20and%20not%20%22Big%20Snappy%20message%22&from=2022-10-12T14:30:00.000Z&to=2022-10-12T14:40:00.000Z)
[https://seq.nethermind.io/#/events?filter=Contains(NodeName,%20'Smoke-Tests-Background[…])&from=2022-10-12T13:30:00.000Z&to=2022-10-12T13:40:00.000Z](https://seq.nethermind.io/#/events?filter=Contains(NodeName,%20'Smoke-Tests-BackgroundPruning-DeafultSnap-ropsten-lodestar')&from=2022-10-12T13:30:00.000Z&to=2022-10-12T13:40:00.000Z)

**Expected behavior**
Connect instantly like it is happening with other CLs.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Smoke tests config
